decision_conditions: The proposed single storey side and rear extension by reason of its height, bulk, massing and proximity to the boundary with Dennan Road would appear an incongruous addition to the original dwelling and would not respect the prevailing pattern of development within the immediate streetscene, thereby conflicting with Policies CS8 and DM10 of the Royal Borough of Kingston Upon Thames Local Development Framework Core Strategy (2012), and the Council's Supplementary SPD Residential Design Guidance (2013).

The proposed revised rear dormer extension, by reason of its increased size would appear an incongruous addition to the original dwelling, would erode the symmetry of the application property with the adjoining semi detached house at 83 Ellerton Road and would not respect the consistent pattern of neighbouring rear dormer development, immediately in Ellerton Road, thereby conflicting with Policies CS8 and DM10 of the Royal Borough of Kingston Upon Thames Local Development Framework Core Strategy (2012), and the Council's Supplementary SPD Residential Design Guidance (2013).
description: Erection of single storey side and rear extension, revised front porch, new front bay window, revised first floor dormer and demolition of side chimney
